| icon              = poe2 quarterstaff_xaurip_icon.png
| description       = Deceptively simple, quarterstaves can be powerful weapons in the hands of a skilled combatant. Wielders can use a quarterstaff's long reach to deliver crushing blows from behind their allies.

Quarterstaves are also common among xaurips, who tend to decorate them with skulls.
